'''''Mallorn'' 51''' is the fifty-first issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s biannual journal ''[[Mallorn (journal)|Mallorn]]'', published in Spring [[2011]].

==Contents==
* '''Cover Art'''
** ''Horse and Riders''
*** By: Becky Hitchin
* '''Editorial'''
** "Ent and sources"
*** By: [[Henry Gee]]
* '''Reviews'''
** "Modern life": ''Restoring Beauty: The Good, the True, and the Beautiful in the Writings of C.S. Lewis''
*** By: Frank Wilson
** "Scholarship collected": ''[[Tolkien Studies: Volume 7|Tolkien Studies: An Annual Scholarly Review, Vol. VII]]''
*** By: Troels Forchhammer
** "Keeping the faith": ''[[wikipedia:Toy Story 3|Toy Story 3]]''
*** By: [[Chad Chisholm]]
* '''Commentary'''
** "[http://www.josemanuelferrandez.com/ENguerra.html J.R.R. Tolkien and the Spanish civil war]"
*** By: [[José Manuel Ferrández Bru]]
** "''There and Back Again'' and other travel books of the 1930s"
*** By: Dale Nelson
** "The 'divine passive' in ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''"
*** By: Kusumita Pedersen
** "Ending the dualism of nature and industry in ''The Lord of the Rings''"
*** By: Sarah J Sprouse
** "Tolkien's use of free will versus predestination in ''The Lord of the Rings''"
*** By: Bud Scott
* '''Poetry'''
** "The Paths of the Dead"
*** By: Tuilinde
* '''Fiction'''
** "How many beans make five"

** "The tale of Aud Sigurdsdottir"

** "Snicker-Snack and the Queen of Egypt"
